import { memo, useState } from 'react'; import "./style.css"; import SelectWithApi from "../../components/Select/Select"; import { options } from "./constants" interface itemsType { itemCode?: number; item?: string; width?: number; height?: number; size?: number; quantity?: number; price?: number; total?: number; notes?: string; } const SupplierInvoice = () => { const [items, setItems] = useState([ { itemCode: 0, item: 'item 1', width: 0, height: 0, size: 0, quantity: 0, price: 0, total: 0 } ]) return ( <>
Item Width Heigh Size Quantity Price Total Notes
{items.map((item) => { return () })}
{item.item} {item.width} {item.height} {item.size} {item.quantity} {item.price} {item.total} {item.notes}
) } export default memo(SupplierInvoice);
